HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to rotate your video
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: Why should I rotate my video?
FAQ.answer: If there has been a mistake while shooting the video, or of a video is potrait mode and you want it in landscape mode you can use rotate. Rotating videos changes the aspect ratio of your videos.

FAQ.question: What are the available rotations?
FAQ.answer: You are given two options: Left and Right. You can either rotate your video clockwise or anticlockwise, depending on your need. You can select either or both the options multiple times until you are satisfied with the rotation.

FAQ.question: How can I rotate my videos to 180 degrees?
FAQ.answer: To rotate your video to 180 degrees you can click on either option, left or right and select it twice. Each selection rotates your video by 90 degrees, therefore two selections will rotate your videos to 180 degrees.

FAQ.question: Will rotating affect the quality of my videos?
FAQ.answer: No, rotating your videos does not affect the quality of your videos. It will only change the aspect ratio of the video.

FAQ.question: Can I upload and rotate any other file type?
FAQ.answer: With Video Rotator, you can upload and rotate any type of video file that you want. It supports MP4, MOV, FLV, AVI, MKV and other video files type.

FAQ.question: Why is it taking so long to process my file?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to rotate and process your video depend on the size, aspect ratio and the number of rotations you have performed. If your file size is bigger, it will take a bit longer than regular files.

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does rotate Video support?
FAQ.answer: Video Rotator is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on windows operating system, but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.

FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers, and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to rotate it.

FAQ.question: How can I rotate multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: Video Rotator allows you to rotate multiple files, one after the other. When you rotate one file and click on save, the video will be processed. After the video has been processed, you can see the download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the rotated file. In order to rotate another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see the upload Video option. Now you can again select your file which you want to rotate.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use rotate Video?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.
